header.title: Join the WaveMAX Affiliate Program
header.subtitle: Partner with Austin's premier laundry service and earn recurring commissions while helping your community save time
header.loginTooltip: Sign in to your existing affiliate account
header.registerTooltip: Create a new affiliate account and start earning

mainHeader.title: Join the WaveMAX Affiliate Program
mainHeader.subtitle: Partner with Austin's premier laundry service and earn recurring commissions while helping your community save time

subtitle.full: Convenient door-to-door service by {{affiliateName}}, with professional washing by WaveMAX

description.part2: provides convenient pickup and delivery right at your doorstep, on your schedule.

professional.title: Professional WDF Processing
professional.description: WaveMAX handles the washing with state-of-the-art Electrolux 450G equipment and Omni LUX UV water purification in a quality-controlled facility.

fastTurnaround.title: Fast Turnaround
fastTurnaround.description: Your clothes are professionally cleaned and returned fresh, folded, and ready to wear - typically within 24-48 hours.

step1.title: Sign Up
step1.description: Create your affiliate account in minutes

step2.title: Share Your Link
step2.description: Get your unique referral link and promo materials

step3.title: Customers Sign Up
step3.description: Your referrals register and schedule pickups

step4.title: Earn Commissions
step4.description: Get paid monthly via direct deposit

step1.title: Schedule Pickup
step1.description: Use our easy app to schedule a pickup time that works for your schedule

description.part2: collects your laundry and transports it to WaveMAX

step3.title: Professional Cleaning
step3.description: WaveMAX expertly washes, dries, and folds using premium equipment

description.part2: delivers fresh, clean laundry back to your door

list.purification: Omni LUX UV water purification for cleanest results
list.transparent: Transparent pricing - pay for convenience & quality

recurring.title: Earn Recurring Income
recurring.description: Get 10% commission on every order from customers you refer, for as long as they remain active

tracking.title: Track Your Success
tracking.description: Real-time dashboard shows your customers, orders, and earnings with detailed analytics

community.title: Help Your Community
community.description: Provide value to your network by introducing them to convenient, reliable laundry service

quality.title: The WaveMAX Quality Difference
quality.subtitle: Your laundry is processed at WaveMAX's state-of-the-art facility

electrolux.title: Electrolux 450G Equipment
electrolux.description: Professional-grade washers and dryers ensure thorough cleaning and gentle care for all fabric types

omniLux.title: Omni LUX UV Purification
omniLux.description: Advanced UV water purification system eliminates 99.9% of bacteria and viruses for the cleanest wash possible

qualityControl.title: Quality Controlled
qualityControl.description: Strict quality control processes ensure consistent results and proper handling of every garment

calculator.title: Calculate Your Potential Earnings
calculator.customersPerWeekHelp: How many customers you can serve weekly

earnings.question: How much can I earn?
earnings.answer: You earn 10% commission on every order. Most active affiliates earn $150-500 per month, with top performers earning more.

cost.question: Is there a cost to join?
cost.answer: No! The affiliate program is completely free to join. There are no fees or minimum requirements.

payment.question: When do I get paid?
payment.answer: Commissions are paid monthly via direct deposit or PayPal, typically by the 10th of each month.

materials.question: What marketing materials do you provide?
materials.answer: We provide flyers, business cards, social media graphics, and email templates to help you promote effectively.

sarah.quote: The WaveMAX affiliate program has been a great source of passive income. My property management clients love the service!
sarah.name: Sarah M.
sarah.title: Property Manager, Austin

mike.quote: Easy to track everything through the dashboard. I've referred 15 customers and the commissions keep coming!
mike.name: Mike T.
mike.title: Local Business Owner

cta.title: Ready to Start Earning?
cta.description: Join hundreds of Austin affiliates who are earning recurring income while helping their community save time on laundry.

subtitle.full: Let {{affiliateName}} handle the pickup and delivery while WaveMAX ensures professional cleaning
subtitle.part2: handle the pickup and delivery while WaveMAX ensures professional cleaning

register.title: Affiliate Registration
register.subtitle: Fill out the form below to register as a WaveMAX Laundry affiliate partner.
register.socialSignupText: Sign up quickly using your social media account - we'll automatically fill in your information!
register.orManually: Or fill out the form manually
register.autoFilledMessage: Your information has been automatically filled in below. Complete the remaining fields to finish your registration.
register.addressPlaceholder: Enter address or click on map
register.addressHelp: Start typing to search for an address
register.serviceAreaInstructions: How to Set Your Service Area
register.serviceAreaStep1: Click on the map to set your service center location
register.serviceAreaStep2: Drag the marker to adjust its position if needed
register.serviceAreaStep3: Use the slider below to set your service radius
register.dynamicPricingDesc: Set a minimum delivery fee and a per-bag fee. Customers pay whichever is higher. You keep 100% of delivery fees.
register.minimumFeeDesc: The minimum fee charged regardless of bag count
register.perBagFeeDesc: Fee charged for each bag of laundry
register.addressAutoFill: The map will automatically center on your business address once all address fields are filled above.
register.validateAddressHelp: Click to verify your address and automatically set your service area center on the map below
register.selectCorrectLocation: We found multiple possible locations. Please select the correct one:
register.confirmCorrectAddress: Please confirm this is the correct address for your service area:
register.roundTripPricing: Prices shown are for round-trip service
register.deliveryNote: * Delivery: 100% of delivery fees go to you
register.commissionNote: * Commission: 10% of WDF service (30 lbs × $1.25/lb per bag)

filters.searchPlaceholder: Search by customer name or order ID

customers.title: Customer Management
customers.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, email, or phone

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.landingPageDesc: Professional landing page to showcase your services and pricing to potential customers
settings.registrationLinkDesc: Direct link for customers to register under your affiliate account
settings.dynamicPricingDesc: Your customers pay whichever is higher: the minimum fee or the calculated per-bag rate. You keep 100% of delivery fees.
settings.minimumFeeDesc: The minimum fee charged regardless of bag count
settings.perBagFeeDesc: Fee charged for each bag of laundry
settings.passwordRequirement: Password must be at least 8 characters long

success.title: Registration Successful!
success.welcomeMessage: Welcome to the WaveMAX Affiliate Program! We're excited to have you as our partner.
success.name: Name
success.marketingLinkDescription: Share this professional landing page with potential customers to showcase your services and pricing:
success.marketingLinkHelp: This page includes information about your services, pricing, and a registration form.
success.linkDescription: Customers can also use this direct link to register:
success.linkHelp: Each customer registered through your links will be associated with your account.
success.nextStep1: Check your email for your welcome message and login credentials
success.nextStep2: Log in to your affiliate dashboard to access marketing materials
success.nextStep3: Share your unique referral link with friends, family, and customers
success.nextStep4: Track your referrals and commissions in real-time
success.nextStep5: Get paid monthly via your preferred payment method
